full_summary:
## Request for Proposal: Smart Building Program - Regional Standing Offer, Atlantic Region

### Overview
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites qualified firms to submit a proposal to establish a Regional Standing Offer (SO) for the Smart Building Program in the Atlantic Region. The project aims to provide "as and when required" work to meet the Department of National Defence (DND) requirements at specified locations.

### Background
DCC seeks a contractor to provide services on an "as and when required" basis to a maximum estimated value of $3,110,000.00 for a period of two (2) years from the date of establishment. Call-ups under the SO are expected to be valued between $100,000.00 and $500,000.00.

### Objective
The objective of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to select one (1) contractor to sign a Regional Standing Offer (SO) with DCC to provide services on an "as and when required" basis.

### Proposal Requirements
Firms interested in submitting a proposal are encouraged to obtain all solicitation documents, including the RFP, from the MERX Electronic Bidding System.

### Proposal Evaluation Criteria
The proponent's proposal will be evaluated based on the established criteria in the RFP.

### Contract Award
Contract award results will be made available on the DCC Website at Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada.

## Important Dates

* Proposal Closing Date: May 4, 2023 at 14:00:00
* Proposal Submission: Electronic submission through the MERX Electronic Bidding System
